New Records: Matt Wallner hit his 13th home run of the season, tying the game after Los Angeles' Taylor Ward led off with his 23rd homer.
Key Match Events: Brooks Lee snapped an 0-for-19 stretch with a go-ahead, two-run double in the seventh inning, and his drive was initially called a home run but a review showed it was a double.
Pre-Game Insights: Minnesota had lost six of its previous seven games and was six games behind Cleveland and 1 1/2 behind Kansas City in the AL Central.
Post-Match Reflections: Minnesota manager Rocco Baldelli noted the good energy and at-bats from his team, while Los Angeles' Jordyn Adams discussed his first career homer.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Angels' Brandon Drury left the game with left hamstring tightness, and Twins activated several players from the injured list post-game.
